subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Carlos Tévez played in his first game since Sept. 27 and set up Samir Nasri’s late go-ahead goal, giving Manchester City a 2-1 comeback win against Chelsea in England’s Premier League.
snippet: Carlos Tévez played in his first game since Sept. 27 and set up Samir Nasri’s late go-ahead goal, giving Manchester City a 2-1 comeback win against Chelsea in England’s Premier League.
